title: random_ and uniform_ in Random sampling section of documentation
body_html:
These are documented in the torch.Tensor section

http://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensors.html

but it would probably be good to have a pointer in the Random Sampling section of the documentation

http://pytorch.org/docs/master/torch.html#random-sampling
body_text:
These are documented in the torch.Tensor section
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensors.html
but it would probably be good to have a pointer in the Random Sampling section of the documentation
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/torch.html#random-sampling
body:
These are documented in the torch.Tensor section 

http://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensors.html

but it would probably be good to have a pointer in the Random Sampling section of the documentation 

http://pytorch.org/docs/master/torch.html#random-sampling
